column1: # The observer Mr Collins is the same observer as for the Galen House site.
# The directions associated with the gauge place it in the Galen House area.
# A comment on the 1920s sheet says that the gauge moved 1 1/4 miles west on March 26th 1929.
# If this comment is accurate, then the first 18 months of this sequence are for the initial site, somewhere to the west of Woodhall Spa.
# There's no detail of where the initial site may have been. Possibly the covered reservoir at TF212640 ?
